item.title: Mother at center of murder-suicide accused of embezzling over $600,000 from employer
item.description: The woman's boss alleges she stole $660,000 from the company over a two-year time period.

item.title: 11-year-old boy fatally shot after ‘ding dong ditch’ doorbell-ringing prank, police say
item.description: Officers were still investigating and had not arrested anybody in connection with the boy's death as of Sunday evening.

item.title: SPD: Homicide investigation underway
item.description: Officers are investigating a homicide that occurred around 3a.m. on Sunday.

item.title: ‘God on our side’: Father fighting for his life after getting infected with flesh-eating bacteria
item.description: A father in Florida is fighting for his life after getting infected with a flesh-eating bacteria.

item.title: FSU football player Ethan Pritchard identified as victim in Havana shooting
item.description: Investigators are still working to determine what led up to the shooting.

item.title: Handmade cards from classmates comfort girl wounded in church shooting, aunt says
item.description: Genevieve was one of the 20 people who were shot during the attack at the Church of Annunciation.

item.title: Costco’s new shopping policy officially starts Monday
item.description: Costco says a grace period is ending and the policy will take effect on Labor Day.

item.title: Labor Day rain chances stay elevated
item.description: We expect the showers to stick around tomorrow as well for Labor Day with a 60% chance of rain.

item.title: Mainly dry for Labor Day Monday
item.description: Thunderstorm activity will be minimal for Labor Day Monday and Tuesday

item.title: Man found dead at annual Burning Man festival, sheriff’s office says
item.description: Authorities say a man has been found dead in a pool of blood at Burning Man, and the death at the yearly art and music festival in the Nevada desert is being investigated as a homicide.

item.title: Body recovered near Anna Maria Island believed to be missing swimmer
item.description: Witnesses told deputies the man was about 100 yards offshore.
